frame.name: Sharpness
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> has a <fen>Sharpness</fen> characterized by its capability to cut. The <fen>Sharpness</fen> is a value of the Attribute of sharpness.
<ex><fex name="Entity">That axe</fex> seems <fex name="Degree">dangerously</fex> <t>sharp</t>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> to which the <fen>Sharpness</fen> attribute is related.
</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Sharpness</fen> from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of having a particular value for <fen>Sharpness</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the <fen>Circumstances</fen> under which the <fen>Entity</fen> has a particular value for the <fen>Sharpness</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Sharpness
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Sharpness</fen> value of the <fen>Entity</fen>. This FE is denoted by the adjectives of the frame.</def-root>
